content:
My team is hiring a senior software engineer to work full-time with me and @Gino Canessa on open source work for the health interop community! If you like to...

  • build demos, prototypes, and reference implementations
  • inform and accelerate health interop standards development
  • â€‹contribute to open source tools and libraries
  • teach and empower health software developers

... then please check out https://careers.microsoft.com/us/en/job/1201965/Senior-Software-Engineer. We're hiring in Madison WI or remotely for the right candidate. If you're interested in this role, https://github.com/microsoft-healthcare-madison/team has more details on our team including active projects & public OKRs.
